channel.title: Git on DanaCoding
channel.description: Recent content in Git on DanaCoding

item.title: Git 最佳实践
item.description: 1. git clone/git pull/git push 报错 fatal: unable to access ‘https://github.com/mofengfs/baorun.co.git/': OpenSSL SSL_connect: Connection was reset in connection to github.com:443 解决办法：这个办法可以让git速度更快。 git config --global --add remote.origin.proxy "127.0.0.1:(proxy http port number)" //我的是 git config --global --add remote.origin.proxy "127.0.0.1:1080" 2. ! [rejected] main -> main (fetch first) 由
